snippet: According to TiqIQ.com, a search engine that scans online ticket resellers, the average asking price for a ticket is $2,645.12, which is 34 percent less than on the day of the A.F.C. and N.F.C. championship games on Jan. 19.
abstract: NFL Roundup; TiqIQ.com, search engine that scans online ticket resellers, shows that the average asking price for a 2014 Super Bowl ticket is $2,645.12, which is 34 percent less than prices for AFC and NFC championship games; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: According to TiqIQ.com, a search engine that scans online ticket resellers, the average asking price for a ticket is $2,645.12, which is 34 percent less than on the day of the A.F.C. and N.F.C. championship games on Jan. 19.

headline.main: Super Bowl Tickets Are a Bargain at More Than $2,000
headline.print_headline: $2,000 Seat at Super Bowl? Be Thankful for the Bargain
